column5: On the old board, I was able to check my profile for threads that I made a post on, making it easy to check for responses.  In My Controls, I can only see the threads that I looked at today, not ones that I posted on yesterday, etc.  How do I keep track?  Thanks.  Oops, this should be in the Help Area.  Sorry guys.

If you click on your username, then "profile options", you can see all your posts.  There are links there to the main thread.  Or, before you post your message, click on "enable email notification" and you will be emailed whenever someone posts on the same thread.
